localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: How do you craft an interview process that accurately assesses a candidate's skill level while ensuring you're not eliminating qualified candidates? Take this 5 minute quiz and get actionable recommendations to improve your technical interview.
nodes.title: NOT THE PIPELINE - Take a 5 minute quiz and fix your tech interview
nodes.author: Jess Solka

localize.description: 你如何打造一个面试流程，准确评估候选人的技能水平，同时确保你不会淘汰合格的候选人？参加这个5分钟的测验，并获得可操作的建议，以改善你的技术面试。
localize.tagline: 5分钟问答，搞定你的技术面试。

localize.description: 你如何打造一個面試流程，準確評估候選人的技能水平，同時確保你不會淘汰合格的候選人？參加這個5分鐘的測驗，並獲得可操作的建議，以改善你的技術面試。
localize.tagline: 5分鐘問答，搞定你的技術面試。

nodes.excerpt: CLIP Playground lets you test OpenAI's new model CLIP from your browser. CLIP is a GPT-3 like AI you can use to perform a variety of tasks that pair both images and text.
nodes.title: CLIP Playground - OpenAI's CLIP model in your browser, like GPT-3 for images
nodes.author: Javier Fuentes

localize.description: CLIP Playground让你从浏览器中测试OpenAI的新模型CLIP。CLIP是一个类似于GPT-3的AI，你可以用它来执行各种图像和文本配对的任务。
localize.tagline: OpenAI的CLIP模型在你的浏览器中，就像GPT-3的图像一样。

localize.description: CLIP Playground讓你從瀏覽器中測試OpenAI的新模型CLIP。CLIP是一個類似於GPT-3的AI，你可以用它來執行各種圖像和文本配對的任務。
localize.tagline: OpenAI的CLIP模型在你的瀏覽器中，就像GPT-3的圖像一樣。

nodes.excerpt: Decentraland is a decentralized virtual reality platform powered by the Ethereum blockchain. Within the Decentraland platform, users can create, experience, and monetize their content and applications.
nodes.title: Decentraland 2.0 - Explore a virtual world owned by its users
nodes.author: Sam Drozdov

localize.description: Decentraland是一个由Ethereum区块链驱动的去中心化虚拟现实平台。在Decentraland平台内，用户可以创建、体验和货币化他们的内容和应用。
localize.tagline: 探索一个属于用户的虚拟世界

localize.description: Decentraland是一個由Ethereum區塊鏈驅動的去中心化虛擬現實平臺。在Decentraland平臺內，用戶可以創建、體驗和貨幣化他們的內容和應用。
localize.tagline: 探索一個屬於用戶的虛擬世界

nodes.excerpt: We help you track, discover and predict TikTok Trends by location, creator, category & more. We also provide personalized trend suggestions specifically for you! With this app you can find trends first and use them to grow your account & create viral videos!
nodes.title: TrendTok - AI powered TikTok analytics for trends, content & sounds
nodes.author: Saniya Shah

localize.description: 我们帮助您跟踪，发现和预测TikTok的趋势，通过位置，创造者，类别等。我们还专门为您提供个性化的趋势建议! 有了这个应用，你可以第一时间发现趋势，并利用它们来发展你的账户和创建病毒视频!
localize.tagline: 由人工智能驱动的TikTok趋势、内容和声音分析。

localize.description: 我們幫助您跟蹤，發現和預測TikTok的趨勢，通過位置，創造者，類別等。我們還專門爲您提供個性化的趨勢建議! 有了這個應用，你可以第一時間發現趨勢，並利用它們來發展你的賬戶和創建病毒視頻!
localize.tagline: 由人工智能驅動的TikTok趨勢、內容和聲音分析。

nodes.excerpt: LP151 automatically generates landing pages in a few minutes without code! Simple editing interface, design generator and adaptive design.
nodes.title: Landing Page Generator by LP151 - SaaS for quick testing of marketing hypothesis
nodes.author: Tatyana Gazizullina

localize.description: LP151无需代码，几分钟内自动生成着陆页! 简单的编辑界面，设计生成器和自适应设计。
localize.tagline: 快速测试营销假设的SaaS服务

nodes.title: Iceberger - Draw an iceberg and see how it will float

localize.tagline: 画一座冰山，看看它如何漂浮。

localize.description: 畫一座冰山，看看它到底會如何浮在水面上。靈感來自於@冰川梅格的一條微博。

nodes.excerpt: Self-learning and discovery are the central tenet of Breadcrumb! The app offers a vast collection of curated content as collections & learning paths! Your child 🧒 📕 Decides what to learn 📝 Discovers their potential 📈 Journals their progress! ❌ No ads
nodes.title: Breadcrumb - Enabling children to explore and learn on their own
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 自学和发现是Breadcrumb的核心宗旨! 这款应用以集合和学习路径的形式提供了大量的精选内容! 您的孩子 🧒 📕 决定学习什么 📝 发现他们的潜力 📈 记录他们的进步! ❌ 无广告
localize.tagline: 让孩子们能够自主探索、自主学习。

localize.description: 自學和發現是Breadcrumb的核心宗旨! 這款應用以集合和學習路徑的形式提供了大量的精選內容! 您的孩子 🧒 📕 決定學習什麼 📝 發現他們的潛力 📈 記錄他們的進步! ❌ 無廣告
localize.tagline: 讓孩子們能夠自主探索、自主學習。

nodes.excerpt: 3d set of 29 looped videos and 42 static images. Smooth animation. High resolution. Transparent background.
nodes.title: LOOPS - Animated 3D shapes for UI projects

localize.tagline: 用于UI项目的3D动画形状

nodes.excerpt: FlutterFlow is an online no-code platform that empowers people to build native mobile apps visually, enabling quick iteration. Unlike other no-code tools, FlutterFlow makes it easy to view and export clean Flutter code that can be customized.
nodes.title: FlutterFlow - Build cross-platform Flutter mobile apps visually.
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: FlutterFlow是一个在线无代码平台，它让人们能够可视化地构建原生移动应用，实现快速迭代。与其他无代码工具不同的是，FlutterFlow可以轻松查看和导出干净的Flutter代码，并可以进行定制。
localize.tagline: 视觉上构建跨平台的Flutter移动应用。

localize.description: FlutterFlow是一個在線無代碼平臺，它讓人們能夠可視化地構建原生移動應用，實現快速迭代。與其他無代碼工具不同的是，FlutterFlow可以輕鬆查看和導出乾淨的Flutter代碼，並可以進行定製。
localize.tagline: 視覺上構建跨平臺的Flutter移動應用。

nodes.excerpt: A free desktop app that sits in your menu bar: — select services you depend on — check their status in your menu bar — get notified when they change their status
nodes.title: Instatus Out - Monitor services in your menu bar
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 一个免费的桌面应用程序，位于您的菜单栏： - 选择您所依赖的服务 - 在您的菜单栏中查看他们的状态 - 当他们改变状态时得到通知。
localize.tagline: 监控菜单栏中的服务

localize.description: 一個免費的桌面應用程序，位於您的菜單欄： - 選擇您所依賴的服務 - 在您的菜單欄中查看他們的狀態 - 當他們改變狀態時得到通知。
localize.tagline: 監控菜單欄中的服務

nodes.excerpt: Make your videos accessible to a global audience by automatically translating your video online. Expand your reach by creating content in multiple languages, to be viewed by people from all over the globe.
nodes.title: Translate Video - Auto translate your video into different languages online
nodes.author: Ben Lang

localize.description: 通过在线自动翻译您的视频，让全球观众都能看到您的视频。通过创建多种语言的内容，扩大您的影响力，让全球各地的人都能看到。
localize.tagline: 自动将您的视频翻译成不同的语言在线

localize.description: 通過在線自動翻譯您的視頻，讓全球觀衆都能看到您的視頻。通過創建多種語言的內容，擴大您的影響力，讓全球各地的人都能看到。
localize.tagline: 自動將您的視頻翻譯成不同的語言在線

nodes.excerpt: Corrily optimizes prices and discounts for subscription and usage-based companies. By copying a few lines of code, you can run experiments to find better prices, localize them to the user, and boost growth and retention.
nodes.title: Corrily - Price localization and optimization for SaaS companies
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Corrily为订阅和使用型公司优化价格和折扣。通过复制几行代码，你可以运行实验来寻找更好的价格，将其本地化到用户，并促进增长和保留。
localize.tagline: SaaS企业的价格本地化和优化

localize.description: Corrily爲訂閱和使用型公司優化價格和折扣。通過複製幾行代碼，你可以運行實驗來尋找更好的價格，將其本地化到用戶，並促進增長和保留。
localize.tagline: SaaS企業的價格本地化和優化

nodes.excerpt: The very first all-in-one Clubhouse management platform: The MVP version of Direcon is designed to solve the urgent problems of people who moderate rooms on Clubhouse like lack of insights about their rooms and limited moderation options.
nodes.title: Direcon for Clubhouse - All-in-one Clubhouse management platform
nodes.author: Sush

localize.description: 第一款一体化的Clubhouse管理平台。MVP版的Direcon是为了解决在Clubhouse上管理房间的人的迫切问题 比如缺乏对房间的了解和有限的管理选择。
localize.tagline: 一体化会所管理平台

localize.description: 第一款一體化的Clubhouse管理平臺。MVP版的Direcon是爲了解決在Clubhouse上管理房間的人的迫切問題 比如缺乏對房間的瞭解和有限的管理選擇。
localize.tagline: 一體化會所管理平臺

nodes.excerpt: It is very simple and minimalist, but it works. This is a widget application that displays actions to be taken right now. Recommended for smartphone addicts. It is a tool for productivity, but I recommend writing down what you need to do right now.
nodes.title: Wyd? - An iOS widget to encourage you to do one thing
nodes.author: Notty

localize.description: 它非常简单和简约，但它工作。这是一个显示现在要采取的行动的小部件应用程序。推荐给智能手机上瘾者。它是一个生产力的工具，但我建议写下你现在需要做的事情。

nodes.excerpt: Easynote is customizable productivity and work managent platform scalable to any team or project. It allows you to organise everything in one single place.
nodes.title: Easynote - One tool to manage all your work in one single place

localize.tagline: 一个工具可以在一个地方管理你所有的工作

localize.tagline: 一個工具可以在一個地方管理你所有的工作

nodes.excerpt: Customers are demanding control over their personal data. Give it to them with ease. ✔ Onboard your app or website in minutes ✔ Securely send data with easy to use APIs and SDKs ✔ Give your end-users complete control with the plug-n-play Personal Data Center.
nodes.title: Rownd Data Privacy Platform - Give your users control over their personal data
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 客户要求对其个人数据进行控制。轻松地为他们提供数据。✔ 在数分钟内完成您的应用程序或网站的安装 ✔ 利用易于使用的 API 和 SDK 安全发送数据 ✔ 利用即插即用的个人数据中心，让您的最终用户完全控制数据。
localize.tagline: 让您的用户控制他们的个人数据

localize.description: 客戶要求對其個人數據進行控制。輕鬆地爲他們提供數據。✔ 在數分鐘內完成您的應用程序或網站的安裝 ✔ 利用易於使用的 API 和 SDK 安全發送數據 ✔ 利用即插即用的個人數據中心，讓您的最終用戶完全控制數據。
localize.tagline: 讓您的用戶控制他們的個人數據

nodes.excerpt: A small tool for exporting competitor social media analytics into csv and xlsx. The tool is mostly free, but we have a premium version for $9/month Facebook pages and hashtag/location data is available soon.
nodes.title: Export Competitor Social Media Data - Social media data into CSV and XLSX
nodes.author: Daniel L

localize.description: 一个小工具，用于将竞争对手的社交媒体分析数据导出为csv和xlsx。该工具主要是免费的，但我们有一个9美元/月的高级版本，Facebook页面和hashtag/位置数据很快就可以使用。
localize.tagline: 将社交媒体数据转化为CSV和XLSX格式。

localize.description: 一個小工具，用於將競爭對手的社交媒體分析數據導出爲csv和xlsx。該工具主要是免費的，但我們有一個9美元/月的高級版本，Facebook頁面和hashtag/位置數據很快就可以使用。
localize.tagline: 將社交媒體數據轉化爲CSV和XLSX格式。

nodes.excerpt: Hosting a party? Let your guests choose the music in real-time with Pyro! Connect your Spotify Account, create a party, invite your guests with a link and you're ready to go. Collaborative listening has never been easier.

nodes.excerpt: ⚠️ Not affiliated with Ray.so ⚠️ Ray.so is a beautiful code snippet generator you can use to show off your code, and now you can use it without leaving your code editor! Just highlight the code you want to upload, and run the RayThis command in VSCode! 🚀📷
nodes.title: RayThis - Generate pretty code snippets right out of VSCode

localize.tagline: 從VSCode中直接生成漂亮的代碼片段。

nodes.excerpt: SalesLab CRM for long cycle sales. We strive to make the most user-friendly CRM in the world. Yes, we still have much work to do to achieve this, but we are ready for it!

localize.tagline: 使用方便，易于销售
